page.title: 17POPULATION 03800597
page.content: The area covered has{a population of } {96.}Contrary to local belief it was found that Rochester and its immediate surroundings are not dominated by the over 60 age group.{25% of the } {population are under l8.}The{19_25 age group is fairly small, 10%. 55% are aged between 25 and 60. 20% are over 60.{There are 3 octogenarians and 1 } {nonagenarian. } The majority of the population has lived in the area all their life, worked in the area too and intend to remain there. The most{transient}group is composed of those aged between 16 and 21 who are in full_time education. When they have completed their courses they expect to{move out of the area to {find suitable employment. }
